commands.name: az iot central app identity assign
commands.summary: Assign managed identities to an IoT Central application.
commands.syntax:
az iot central app identity assign --name
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--system-assigned]
examples: az iot central app identity assign --name my-iotc-app --resource-group MyResourceGroup --system-assigned

commands.name: az iot central app identity remove
commands.summary: Remove managed identities from an IoT Central application.
commands.syntax:
az iot central app identity remove --name
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--system-assigned]
examples: az iot central app identity remove --name my-iotc-app --resource-group MyResourceGroup --system-assigned

commands.name: az iot central app identity show
commands.summary: Show the identity properties of an IoT Central application.
commands.syntax:
az iot central app identity show --name
                                 [--resource-group]
examples: az iot central app identity show --name my-iotc-app --resource-group MyResourceGroup
